comment.author: 58372389@N00
comment._content: Actually, if you see more of this kind of pics you'll see some of them are print mistakes, mainly related to the kind of printing or revealing methods they were using. Photoshop? That's a simplistic view. It is very likely that this photographers were firts VERY impressed by the outcomes of double exposure, then figured out how to reproduce it, and then started producing this sort of "spirit" series. This kind of stuff are being reproduced even now, with digital photography and, yes, Photoshop.
